languages.text: {n}Фигура в истлевших обносках покачивается из стороны в сторону, то что-то невнятно бормоча на разные голоса, то заходясь хриплым смехом. Когда вы подходите ближе, она замирает, и лицо в уродливой ржавой маске медленно поворачивается к вам:{/n} "Ты... приш{mf|ел|ла}, чтобы проводить Здену на другую сторону? Нет... Нет-нет-нет".

{n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."
languages.original_text: {n}Фигура в истлевших обносках покачивается из стороны в сторону, то что-то невнятно бормоча на разные голоса, то заходясь хриплым смехом. Когда вы подходите ближе, она замирает, и лицо в уродливой ржавой маске медленно поворачивается к вам:{/n} "Ты... приш{mf|ел|ла}, чтобы проводить Здену на другую сторону? Нет... Нет-нет-нет".

traits.locale_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices and sometimes breaking into hoarse laughter. As you walk closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusty mask is covering her face.{/n} "Are... you here to usher Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

languages.text: {n}Una figura con harapos en mal estado se balancea adelante y atrás, murmurando con distintas voces y estallando ocasionalmente en carcajadas roncas. Cuando te acercas, se queda inmóvil y se gira lentamente para mirarte. Una máscara fea y oxidada cubre su rostro.{/n} «¿Estás... aquí para llevarte a Zdena al otro lado? No. No, no, no».
languages.original_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una figura con harapos en mal estado se balancea adelante y atrás, murmurando con distintas voces y estallando ocasionalmente en carcajadas roncas. Cuando te acercas, se queda inmóvil y se gira lentamente para mirarte. Una máscara fea y oxidada cubre su rostro.{/n} «¿Estás... aquí para llevarte a Zdena al otro lado? No. No, no, no».

languages.text: {n}朽ち果てたボロボロの人影があちらこちらで揺れ動いている。さまざまな異なる声が不明瞭なつぶやく。時折、かすれた笑い声が上がる。あなたが近づくと彼女は動きをぴたりと止め、ゆっくりとこちらへと振り向く。醜い、錆びた仮面が彼女の顔を覆っている。{/n}「お前は…ここでズデナを、あちら側に連れていく？嫌だ。嫌だ、嫌だ、嫌だ」
languages.original_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

traits.locale_text: {n}朽ち果てたボロボロの人影があちらこちらで揺れ動いている。さまざまな異なる声が不明瞭なつぶやく。時折、かすれた笑い声が上がる。あなたが近づくと彼女は動きをぴたりと止め、ゆっくりとこちらへと振り向く。醜い、錆びた仮面が彼女の顔を覆っている。{/n}「お前は…ここでズデナを、あちら側に連れていく？嫌だ。嫌だ、嫌だ、嫌だ」

languages.text: {n}一个衣衫褴褛的人来来回回踱着步，用好几种不同的声音含糊地咕哝着，时而发出沙哑的笑声。当你靠近她时，她愣在了那里，慢慢转过身，看着你。她的脸上带着生了锈的丑陋面具。{/n}“你是来……带兹迪娜去彼岸的吗？不，不，不要。”
languages.original_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

traits.locale_text: {n}一个衣衫褴褛的人来来回回踱着步，用好几种不同的声音含糊地咕哝着，时而发出沙哑的笑声。当你靠近她时，她愣在了那里，慢慢转过身，看着你。她的脸上带着生了锈的丑陋面具。{/n}“你是来……带兹迪娜去彼岸的吗？不，不，不要。”

languages.text: {n}Eine Gestalt in verrottenden Lumpen wiegt sich hin und her, murmelt mit verschiedenen Stimmen Unverständliches und bricht hin und wieder in heiseres Lachen aus. Als du dich näherst, erstarrt sie, dreht sich langsam zu dir um und sieht dich an. Eine hässliche, verrostete Maske bedeckt ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Seid Ihr ... hier, um Zdena auf die andere Seite zu bringen? Nein. Nein, nein, nein."
languages.original_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Gestalt in verrottenden Lumpen wiegt sich hin und her, murmelt mit verschiedenen Stimmen Unverständliches und bricht hin und wieder in heiseres Lachen aus. Als du dich näherst, erstarrt sie, dreht sich langsam zu dir um und sieht dich an. Eine hässliche, verrostete Maske bedeckt ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Seid Ihr ... hier, um Zdena auf die andere Seite zu bringen? Nein. Nein, nein, nein."

languages.text: {n}Une silhouette en haillons se balance d'avant en arrière en marmonnant des paroles incompréhensibles de différentes voix, parfois entrecoupées d'un rire rauque. Elle se fige en vous sentant approcher et se tourne lentement pour vous faire face. Un masque hideux et rouillé dissimule son visage.{/n} « Êtes-vous {mf|venu|venue}... pour faire passer Zdena de l'autre côté ? Non. Non, non, non. »
languages.original_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."

languages.text: {n}Çürüyen paçavralar içindeki bir figür, bir öne bir arkaya sallanıyor. Birkaç farklı ses tonunda belli belirsiz mırıldanarak arada sırada boğuk bir kahkaha patlatıyor. Yaklaşmanla birlikte donakalarak sana bakmak için yavaşça etrafında dönüyor. Yüzünü çirkin, paslı bir maske kaplıyor.{/n} "Buraya... Zdena'yı öteki tarafa götürmeye mi geldin? Hayır. Hayır, olamaz."
languages.original_text: {n}A figure in decaying tatters is rocking to and fro, muttering indistinctly in several different voices, occasionally breaking into hoarse laughter. As you come closer, she freezes and turns slowly to look at you. An ugly, rusted mask covers her face.{/n} "Are you... here to take Zdena to the other side? No. No no no."
